name: Nothing is as they seem
description:
A playable platformer game. Use the arrow keys to move and spacebar to jump. In the world of nothing is as they seem, the coinicon counts the enemy kills and the enemy slime icon counts the coin collected. The main character(zombie) has 3 lives which it can replenish by picking up small version of its head. Some platforms can can upon collision. Everything is truely INCONGRUOUS!

Enemies can help the player(zombie)  jump high

Pick up the square gold coin to clear the game.
